title: Smart Data Models - Ucifi / Device Extension
description: The uCIFI device extension is an extension to the standard Lightweight M2M device (object ID 3) using the resource called "ExtDevInfo" (resource ID 22).. objectID:'3410'. objectURN:'urn:oma:lwm2m:ext:3410:2.0'. lwm2mVersion:'1.0'. objectVersion:'2.0'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `Device Extension`.

GTIN model number.description: Property. Standard global trade-in international number for the control device.. resourceID:'1'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Manufacturer identifier.description: Property. Unique identifier of the manufacturer of the control device, equivalent to IEEE's OUI (Organizational Unique Identifier). This value should be a Hexadecimal value. This value may be used by an online uCIFI product catalog server, for software modules to retrieve the data model of a device using this attribute associated with the model number on the "Device" (Id=3) object.. resourceID:'2'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Mandatory'.

User-given name.description: Property. User-readable name of the device set by the user.. resourceID:'3'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Asset identifier.description: Property. Identifier of the asset (e.g. meter, luminaire, container) that is controlled by the device.. resourceID:'4'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Installation date.description: Property. Installation date of the device.. resourceID:'5'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Software update.description: Property. Set to True while software within the device is being updated.. resourceID:'6'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Maintenance.description: Property. Set to True when the device is in maintenance mode.. resourceID:'7'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Configuration reset.description: Property. Reset the configuration parameters (and only the configuration parameters) of the device. It does not clear any counter (e.g. kWh counter or operating hour counter). [Executable resource]. resourceID:'8'. operations:'E'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Device operating hours.description: Property. Cumulated number of hours during which the device has been powered on.. resourceID:'9'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'h'.

Additional firmware information.description: Property. Additional information about peripheral firmware versions. The format is left to the vendor.. resourceID:'10'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.

DST Start.description: Property. The precise date and UTC time during the year when Daylight Saving Time begins, represented as Unix Time.. resourceID:'11'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.

DST End.description: Property. The precise date and UTC time during the year when Daylight Saving Time ends, represented as Unix Time.. resourceID:'12'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

DST Offset.description: Property. The amount by which the UTC offset changes when Daylight Saving Time is in effect, represented as ISO 8601 time offset format. A DST offset of one hour is represented as "01:00". resourceID:'13'. operations:'RW'. multipleInstances:'Multiple'. mandatory:'Optional'.

Uptime.description: Property. Number of seconds since the last reboot of the device.. resourceID:'14'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'. units:'s'.

RFD device.description: Property. Set to true if the device is a Reduce Functional Device running on battery.. resourceID:'15'. operations:'R'. multipleInstances:'Single'. mandatory:'Optional'.
